titles.title: Reaffirming the close partnership between the United States and the Republic of Kosovo.
Reaffirming the close partnership between the United States and the Republic of Kosovo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense that (1) the United States and Kosovo remain close partners, and (2) recognizing Kosovo as a sovereign, independent, democratic, multiethnic state within its recognized borders should remain U.S. policy.
